name: The Darkness (itch) (DrRenzNDS)
description:
Attention!
This game is 50% English and 50% German.
The beginning of this game was created by using a Unity tutorial. You can find the tutorial on Jimmy Vegas Youtube channel !!
Here are the controls:
Movement: W A S D
Interact: E
Shoot: Left Mousbottun
Aim: Right Mousbutton
If you go over a usable object with the dot in the middle, a crosshair will appear !!!
Voice acting by Jimmy Vegas!
The game ends in room 3. There is a long corridor with lots of dolls.
